title: Titration of HA - relative concentrations of species

content.question: Which of the following shows the relative concentrations of species in the solution represented by point <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> on the titration curve?

choices.label: <math alttext="the molar concentration of H with a positive 1 charge, equals the molar concentration of O H with a negative 1 charge, which is greater than the molar concentration of A with a negative 1 charge" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>[H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mtext>OH</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo><mo>></mo><msup><mrow><mtext>[A</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the molar concentration of H with a positive 1 charge is greater than the molar concentration of O H with a negative 1 charge, which equals the molar concentration of A with a negative 1 charge" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>[H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo><mo>></mo><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mtext>OH</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mtext>[A</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the molar concentration of O H with a negative 1 charge, is greater than the molar concentration of A with a negative 1 charge, which is greater than the molar concentration of H with a positive 1 charge" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mtext>OH</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo><mo>></mo><msup><mrow><mtext>[A</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo><mo>></mo><msup><mrow><mtext>[H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the molar concentration of A with a negative 1 charge, is greater than the molar concentration of O H with a negative 1 charge, which is greater than the molar concentration of H with a positive 1 charge" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>[A</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo><mo>></mo><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mtext>OH</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo><mo>></mo><msup><mrow><mtext>[H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the molar concentration of A with a negative 1 charge, is greater than the molar concentration of O H with a negative 1 charge, which is greater than the molar concentration of H with a positive 1 charge" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>[A</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo><mo>></mo><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mtext>OH</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo><mo>></mo><msup><mrow><mtext>[H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 5.D: Identify information presented graphically to solve a problem.
